mapper.insert: insert into f_bank_account(name, account_number, remark, is_visible, in_use, initial_balance) values(#{name}, #{accountNumber}, #{remark}, #{isVisible}, #{inUse}, #{initialBalance})
mapper.update: update f_bank_account set name = #{name}, account_number = #{accountNumber}, remark = #{remark}, is_visible = #{isVisible}, in_use = #{inUse}, initial_balance = #{initialBalance} where bank_account_id = #{bankAccountID}
mapper.select: select bank_account_id, name, account_number, remark, is_visible, in_use, initial_balance from f_bank_account;
select bank_account_id, name, account_number, remark, is_visible, in_use, initial_balance from f_bank_account where is_visible = 1
